short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Cast a Toka minting frame from any Zora mint URL

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Makes it easy to cast a Toka minting frame for your Zora item via Warpcast. Hit the Toka icon in the browser bar to start a new cast with the Toka frame embedded. You will be able to edit the cast before sending. Followers will be able to mint your Zora item completely onframe.
